column4: Hey all, I been looking all over the forum how to make my microphone work with TeamSpeak but for some reason it is recongnizing the mic but not capturing anything I say? Can anyone help me please?
Hey all, I been looking all over the forum how to make my microphone work with TeamSpeak but for some reason it is recognizing the mic but not capturing anything I say? Can anyone help me please?
thx anyways. its just really weird since i put capture on to max on volume control
